function_reachability: Is it impossible for function 'printf' to reach function 'main'?
Is it impossible for function 'rand' to reach function 'printf'?
Is there a call path from function 'main' to function 'rand'?
loop_reachability: Is it possible that the loop with condition 'i<10' is never executed?
Is the loop with condition 'i<10' always executed?
Can the loop with condition 'j<10' be skipped entirely?
Is the loop with condition 'j<10' always executed?
dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'i<10' without passing through its header block?
Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'j<10' without passing through its header block?
data_dependency: Does the value assigned to 'argc' affect subsequent computations?
Is variable 'file (line 5)' used after its definition?
liveness: Does variable 't' remain in use at the end of function 'main'?
Does variable 'rig' remain in use at the end of function 'main'?
dead_code: Can the program actually reach the statement: “cento[cas1+contatore]=2;”?
